sorcer.file.remote

Class SharedFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.file.remote.AbstractRemoteFile
      • sorcer.file.remote.SharedFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteFile

    public class SharedFile
extends AbstractRemoteFile
    Remote file that uses shared disk for access. File is not copied upon access, but the checksum is verified upon accessing the File object.
    Author:
    Rafał Krupiński
